official_title: A bill to allow the continuation of commercial fishing in certain federal waters off Alaska.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act of 1980 to permit commercial fishing activities within the Glacier Bay Wilderness in Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to allow the continuation of commercial fishing in certain federal waters off Alaska.
